Package camzup.pfriendly

Interface IUp

All Known Subinterfaces:
IUp3, IUpOgl, IYup2
All Known Implementing Classes:
Up3, UpOgl, Yup2, Yup3, YupJ2, Zup3
public interface IUp
Maintains consistent behavior across renderers in the CamZup library.

    Default scalar by which the height of the sketch is multiplied when the default camera function is called, 0.8660253882408142f.

    The Processing default color max, 255.0f.

    DEFAULT_FAR_CLIP

    The scalar by which a sketch's dimensions are multiplied to find an appropriate line length, 0.3499999940395355f.
    static final float

    Default stroke-weight of an origin's lines, 1.25f.
    static final int
    DEFAULT_J_COLOR
    Default color of the y axis when displayed by a camera's origin function, (0.0, 0.7019, 0.20) in RGB.

    Default color of the z axis when displayed by a camera's origin function, in (0.0784, 0.4588, 0.7019) in RGB.

    The stroke weight of a fore handle point relative to a knot's line when drawing handles, 5.0f.

    MIXER_RGBA
    A cached easing function for RGBA colors.

  • Field Details

    • COLOR_MODE_MAX

      static final float COLOR_MODE_MAX
      Maximum color mode scale. Set to 1000.0f to mitigate precision issues resulting from float-int 32 color conversion.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • COLOR_MODE_MIN

      static final float COLOR_MODE_MIN
      Minimum color mode scale. Defaults to 1.0f.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_ASPECT

      static final float DEFAULT_ASPECT
      Default camera aspect ratio used by perspective camera when size is less than 128, 1.0f.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_BKG_COLOR

      See Also:

      dest - the destination color
